<title
    level="1"

    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swarming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1871)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 33 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a  thrown  weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Able to copy itself many times over when thrown until the air is filled with deadly blades, a swarming weapon turns a single weapon into a shower of devastation.

<document level="2" id="action-1568" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Swarming
